Need to look for an artist, a label, a bpm, a key... ?

Overview

#Techno #Minimal #Tech-House #Garage #Acid #Tribe

To celebrate Da Productor's latest Acid release, Moduled Records is organizing a remix contest of the 3 tracks from Da Productor on the new EP "Another World".

No imposed style but preferably stay in the binary of tech house, garage, minimal, techno, acid and tribe...

Send wav file(s) to [email protected]

No Soundcloud, no Mixcloud

Need a new kind of synth?

Ad PluginBoutique

Atoms is a new kind of synth plugin that utilizes cutting edge physical modeling to generate an endless variety of organic and otherworldly sounds. Use it to build naturally rich textures that the world hasn’t heard before.

Overview

#Dubstep

#bpm145

​#keyFmin

In celebration of the release of 'Fluxiverse' Flux Pavilion, Doctor P and Circus are giving you the chance to remix '24/7'

Overview

#Techno #HardTechno #DarkTechno #UndergroundTechno

Only Techno, Hard Techno, Dark Techno, and Underground Techno remixes will be accepted.

Completed remixes should be sent to [email protected] with the download link

What about Oxytech Records?

Oxytech Records - is a developing Ukrainian label that created by two producers Terra4Beat (Den Golivets) & Neurofaza (Sasha Scebro) in July 2013, which is specialized in the production of high-quality music and Techno style is different from many of its underground and individual sound. The purpose of creation is promotion of young talents and has already experienced in the largest electronic stores worldwide.

Some contests already proposed by the label the last 4 years

Go to contest page!

Need more stuff form East Europe?

After four decades, the techno movement seems to be unstoppable, now more than ever! As proof of this statement, this brand-new pack by THICK SOUNDS, produced by one of Ukraine’s rising talents Sasha Storm, brings serious heat from the hard/driving techno scene.

​

Inspired by artists like Oscar Mulero, Michel Lauriola, Sol Ortega, Alarico and Ruslan Mays, this young artist delivers here a tremendous collection designed for producers who are looking for high-velocity synths, acid sequences, stomping drums, and shifting basses.

Overview

#Tech House #EDM

​

#bpm125

#keyEmin

Saudi Arabia’s leading and pioneering female DJ/producer, Cosmicat, has teamed up with LabelRadar for a remix competition, asking producers from across the globe to put their own personal spin on her new track, “Lovers Game” — a powerful and blissed-out track featuring uplifting vocals from the artist’s close friend and collaborator, Ss.hh.a.n.a.

Who is Cosmicat?

#J Pop #EDM

#bpm128

​#keyAmin

Remix iamSHUM's City Lights to win a bundle of software prizes and the chance to have your song released by WARNER HYPE MUSIC as one of the songs on the iamSHUM City Lights remix album.

Who is?

As a songwriter and lyricist, iamSHUM has worked with Japan's major Pop-Artists like Kis-My-Ft2, RADIO FISH, lol, Kumi Koda, SEAMO, hiroko (mihimaru GT), and many others on dance music, J-POP, and theme song production for movies.

Label Radar contest page

Need some help?

Ad PluginBoutique / ProducerTech

Enjoy huge savings on industry-leading Producertech video courses including guides to Massive, Serum, Spire, Avenger, Scaler 2, Music Theory, Mastering, EQ, Compression, and many many more for all levels from beginner to advanced

Overview

#Future Pop

#bpm120

#keyFmin

An evolution into the artist EUNICE, the main vocalist of the girl group DIA. 'BLACK HOLE' is a captivating track with a dreamy Future Bass synth foundation, delivering both intensity and deep spatial sensations. EUNICE's voice harmonizes beautifully with the sound. From lyrics to composition and artwork, EUNICE has left her mark on every aspect of this well-made track.

Go to the contest page!

Need to loop?

Ad PluginBoutique / LoopCloud

Whether you create kits from scratch or intricately edit loops, Loopcloud DRUM will enhance the way you work with beats.

​Loopcloud PLAY gives you access to an endless gallery of top-quality sounds from global genres and industry experts, packaged in a focused and easy-to-use interface.

#bpm126

#keyAmin

Berlin based artist Eleonora is known to combine many genres like drone, indie, techno and downtempo in her own productions. The style and the singer-songwriting as well as the timbre of the voice has become a trademark of Eleonora now recognizable by many.

Natura Viva is an Italian independent label, focused on House Music and Techno.

Overview

#Techno #DarkTechno #IndustrialTechno #HardTechno

#BVRTHECROW

The track speed must be between 135 and 150 bpm.

Upload to your Soundcloud full length track mp3 format as Public post (Not Private!).

​Use the cover for your remix which is inside the Drop Box link above

Please make a tag #BVRTHECROW on your remix track.

Then please send us via email to: [email protected] (subject BVRTHECROW)

Please do not send it via Soundcloud, Instagram's direct message!

Some entries

Go to the SoundCloud contest page!

Need some stuff?

Ad Loopmasters

Overview

#Deathstep #Darkstep #Dubstep #Heavy #Tearout #Minatory

​#Withmanyvoices

#bpm140

​#keyEmin

Winners of the remix contest will be featured in an remix EP releasing in early 2024. 1st place winner will also receive a prize of $250.

Rules

1. Each Entrant is limited to a total of one (1) submission.

2. Entrant must include a valid email to be contacted on

3. Track must be sent to [email protected] or in the Hydraulic Records discord under the #Withmanyvoices as a private soundcloud link (No attachments)

4. Each Submission must not contain any copyrighted works provided. Use of unauthorized music or other copyrighted works may result in disqualification of the Submission. Using Stems of the Original song is fine.

5. #Deathstep #Minatory #Tearout and other heavy genres are prefered but you can do whatever genre as well.

6. Submissions must be delivered on a SoundCloud link.

7. If you plan on uploading your entry publicly on SoundCloud or YouTube, make sure that it’s the tune is only a clip and not the full project.

Some entries

#Psytrance #Trance

#PriestRemixContest #SoundofScienceRemixed

PsynOpticz Records is thrilled to announce the launch of its first-ever remix competition, featuring the iconic track "Sound of Science" from our South African artist, Priest CT .

The "Sound of Science" remix competition is open to all producers, regardless of experience level.

#Hard Dance

The popular austrian music producer 'Dancecore N3rd' has made one of his hard dance productions called 'Frozen' available for a remix contest! Register now for the Dancecore N3rd Remix Contest, with the chance to be featured on the 'Dancecore N3rd 'Frozen' REMIX EDITION release!

​#keyD#maj

"Down" is a blend of chill electro-pop, with catchy melodies, a playful topline and plenty of space to get creative. It's ripe for remixing and now it's yours to flip!

Some of 350 entries to be accepted

Already 170 entries submited the 8th of February...

#Drum&Bass #NeuroBass #Bass

#bpm174

​#keyC#min

HUSKI howls at the fresh 2024 year with new music, his new label imprint HUSKI BASS, and another exciting remix contest giving rising producers a chance to be featured in the official “Be Your Fantasy” Remix EP dropping in March.

Submit your remixes to [email protected] or [email protected]

Overview

#EDM

Get ready to spin your magic into the vibrant beats of Lucas & Steve's latest smash hit, "When I Wake Up," featuring Skinny Days! Infused with a captivating warm, deep voice, this track is begging for your creative touch. Aspiring remixers unleash your creativity and craft your most electrifying remix yet for a chance to shine in the spotlight. The stakes are high as the winning remix will not only score an exclusive online studio session with Lucas & Steve on the production of their remix but also win the chance to have their winning remix uploaded to Lucas & Steve;s YouTube channel.

Spinnin'Records contest page

Need to de-...?

Ad PluginBoutique / SuperTone

Powered by cutting edge neural network models, CLEAR separates audio into three channels: ambience, voice, and voice reverb. The simple and intuitive three channel allows you to instantly take full control of the clarity of your voice.

​Powered by Supertone AI, CLEAR’s separation algorithm offers the highest performance, leaving minimal artifacts in the result.

Overview

#ElectroPop

#bpm140

Become a part of the MIKU EXPO 10th Anniversary celebrations by entering the “HATSUNE MIKU EXPO 10th Anniversary Song Remix Contest”!

Create and submit your own remix of “Intergalactic Bound,” the MIKU EXPO 10th Anniversary theme song by Yunosuke and CircusP!

#Tech-House #House

​

#bpm128

#keyC#

Formed by Jeronemo & Timonin in 2023, Rabbit Punch brings together diverse influences and backgrounds to create a truly captivating musical experience. With a shared passion for pushing boundaries and breaking the mold, they have developed a sound that seamlessly fuses elements of Tech House, House, and Hip-Hop, resulting in a fresh and captivating sonic landscape.
